short_summary: The current Supply Arrangement for Events Management Services (EN578-171582) is ending on September 30, 2024. Public Services and Procurement Canada plans to consult industry during winter 2024.
description: The purpose of the Request for Information is to ask questions to solicit information and feedback from industry. Following the RFI process, a Request for Supply Arrangement will be posted.
duration_in_months: Il estimé qu'un contrait prendra dure 12 mois.
full_summary:
=================================
**Title**
---------------

Letter of Interest
-------------------

AMD 001 - NOTICE TO INDUSTRY

Event Management Services)

### Government Tender Announcement
### ------------------------------------

**Solicitation Number**
-------------------------

WS4337902851

**Tender Closing Date**
------------------------

14:00, April 4, 2024

**Background**
--------------

The current Supply Arrangement for Event Management Services (EN578-171582) will expire on September 30, 2024. Public Services and Procurement Canada intends to consult with industry regarding the planning and provision of event management services.

**Tender Process**
------------------

A Request for Information (RFI) will be posted on the Government of Canada's contracting website, [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en), in winter 2024. The RFI will be used to solicit information and gather feedback from industry stakeholders. 

Subsequent to the RFI process, a Request for Supply Arrangement will be issued to obtain responses from qualified vendors. This will enable Public Services and Procurement Canada to identify potential suppliers who can provide event management services to the Department of Public Works and Government Services.

**Notices**
------------

This tender announcement is issued in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Opportunities**
----------------

This tender is open to all interested vendors who can provide event management services to the Department of Public Works and Government Services.

**Clarity of Participation**
---------------------------

To obtain additional information or clarification, potential vendors are encouraged to contact:

Ngoma Nkiama
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: <ngoma.nkiama@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca> 
Website: [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en)

### Important Details
#### Region of Delivery
-------------------------

Canada

#### Procurement Method
------------------------

Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Urgency
------------

There is no urgency associated with this project.

#### Notice URL
----------------

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en 

Please note: This is a summary of the provided text. As the original text was quite expansive, certain information has been omitted and reformatted. 
Relevant information has been extracted and prioritized according to importance and relevance. If you require additional details or extended information, please request further clarification. 
The rewritten text does not include incomplete, irrelevant or extraneous information from the original entry
